name: bellum's Stuff
short_description:
bstuff - Home of bs4cs
bs4cs, a spin-off of Seife's buildsystem adapted to build Neutrino-HD from current
CST sources for CST STBs only.

It's intended use is to build a .bin-file for original CST firmware images
which can be transfered to the STB and installed with Neutrino-HD's
normal update mechanism.

For more information and questions please visit the DBox2World-Forum at
http://www.dbox2world.net/board293-cst-coolstream/board314-cst-coolstream-development/board357-buildsysteme/board361-bs4cs/p154668-bs4cs-buildsystem-für-coolstream-neutrino-hd-für-original-cst-image
(native in German but we speak English, too)

Have fun!
